title.rendered: Workshops for students and teachers of Sishu Vidyapith

content.rendered:
Smile Foundation conducted workshops for students and teachers of Sishu Vidyapith HSS, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, under its Child for Child (CFC) programme. The workshops were conducted for both English and Hindi medium sections of the school.

Over 500 students attended the value education workshop, while the teachers’ workshop was focused on enhancing student-teacher communication. The students as well as the teachers thoroughly enjoyed the sessions. The school principals, Mrs. Cargo Roy (English Medium) and Mrs. Neena Pramanick (Hindi Medium), shared that following the workshops, they hope to see positive changes in the teachers and students in the days to come.
